title: y it say pixel.or.nexus on android updates.anything i look up shows as nexus or pixel.i have Samsun
content: Even in device it only gives options for nexus or pixel  . I think my phone is constantly being remotely accessed as far as log says and cant get help. Ive been afraid for a long time .if i pick up my phone and screen locked camera reversed screen is on (i dont take selfies ever im in older woman ) my phone says to hear recored calls press allow permission from individual numbers ,sprint has wiped phone 7 times and said theres code on it .root files constantly being accessed  . Im at a loss and petrified.  Amazon aws s3 is always coming up amazon said someone is there but for privacy reasons cant tell me account. Im a prime member and said its not me but cant say even after i told them im worried for my safety  please help
